meanings.definition: A small basket carried in one hand.
meanings.sent1: She picked up the handbaskets filled with fresh fruits.
meanings.sent2: The market vendor displayed various handbaskets for sale.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the handbaskets made her feel like a skilled shopper.
meanings.sent4: The handbaskets hanging on the wall added a rustic charm to the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The woven handbaskets were perfect for organizing small items.

meanings.sent1: The old building began to handbaskets after years of neglect.
meanings.sent2: If we don't take care of the garden, it will handbaskets.
meanings.sent3: Leaving the fruit out too long caused it to handbaskets quickly.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting regular maintenance will make the car handbaskets.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house started to handbaskets into disrepair.
